answers.answer: Well, I am just really beginning to think that my doctors dont care. I just called and talked to the midwife at the hospital....telling her my concerns. How I have been out of work since December, that this is affecting my life....my relationship with my husband and our well being.....and asked what the choices were. She said they wont induce unless medically necessary. So, I asked her to check on my 24 hour urine that I dropped off yesterday to see if it was any worse than 309 (protein level) and she said that it is 392. So, its worse, but she said it could be worse than that. She told me to wait til tomorrow and call the doctors office and speak with someone about it..and go from there. I am just at the point where I feel like they dont care!

i feel u   i am going through the same thing and i  begin to wonder if doctors really do care about their  patients.  I would think  ur doctor would be considering it seeing  that the protein is getting  worse. Go in demanding some answers from them .  that is what i  did and they are  decided what they are  going to  do with me on Tuesday due to my  baby size and my medically history ( larger the  baby in my family  higher risk ofserve bleeeding after)  you have right to  ur  care and how it  goes u are the patient. I hate it when if  feels like are treating u just like a  carrier pod or something  huh.  They  higher ur stress level the  higher ur BP is going to  go and that  could  cause issues.. I dont think the  midwife can make the  choice wether or  not to  induce i am not to  sure  I know they have to  discuss it over with the covering  Doctor  but  tell them u  want to  be part of the  conversation..   I know the money  issue is  hard me and  my hubby are  going through the  same thing . We have rent and cars and  our other to two kids to  take care of so i know how  bad that is stressing u out. just try to calm  down as much as u  can ok  i know  easier said than done but there is no need today to  get urself worked up.  Wait call them frist thing in the morning  and  demand answers. Ok  hope that  helps  if need  to vent to anyone  feel free to  send me and  email  on here  good luckJesselynn

Thanks Jesselynn! I am hoping to get some answers first thing in the morning. My MIL is packing tonight and waiting for my phone call in the morning bc she is driving from VA to NY where we are and we are supposed to get a storm on Tues-Wed so she doesnt want to get stuck in it..Thats another thing I have to worry about too.....I am hoping that they will just set a date for me and let me have this baby so that I dont have to stress out anymore and can just relax with my little one home!!!

oh am soo sorry you are going through this ! giving birth mekes you even more sensitive so i would really suggest that you try to relax before you deliever..i know it's hard but it's going to be harder to feel sad if the baby is around ....i know they wont induce you unless it's for a medical reason i was induced because my water broke at home and i was only 1 cm ..i remember that i had an appointment 4 days prior to the delievery and nothing was happening and she never suggested any induction (i had severe back pain due to a car accident when i was 3 months pregnant)...one thing the nurse told me though if you try to relax your body will respond better ..i hope you deliever very soon and please try to think that everything will be ok ..this should be the happiest time of your life dont let the stress take over..

See, and this is happening to me.i thought my doctor would be NICE enough to induce me for winter and child reasons.  He was all up to it and told me only if my cervix is favorable.  But if my cervix is very soft, 50% effaced...the potosin (sp?) would help me dilate...right?  So what the hell is the big deal with these doctors?  They hel pother woman who wanted their abby's birthday to be 8/8/08, but they can't help people out who are in SERIOUS situations?Lance06~I'm so sorry this is happening to you.  Tomorrow I'll be 38 weeks and just VERY VERY upset that nobody is willing to help~I wish you all the luck and hopefully something natural will happen....(water breaking.....) SOMETHING!Thinking of you-Brandi

Well, I am hoping to hear good news in the morning because my MIL is leaving from VA to NY in the morning bc she thinks induction is a must at this point (shes an RN on the delivery floor in her hospital). She says my numbers are not good and she doesnt understnad why they havent scheduled my induction already.So girls..I will give you an update in the morning on what happens and if I am in fact being induced!
I really hope you hear good news :)  Let us know for sure~Good luck

Lance, unfortunately I don't think they will take any of that into consideration. As much as your finances and relationship with your spouse is very important...to them the safety of you and your baby is most important. So unless you or your baby are medically at risk, they won't induce. I got nervous when they scheduled mine because I thought something was wrong and his reasoning was because he thinks if I go any longer than 5 days past my due date I won't be able to deliver. But he would not schedule it a second earlier. So they do have their reasons.But like you, I think if your that close to your due date, your healthy and the baby is healthy there's no reason why they can't try inducing you...especially considering all things. But as doctors they just like to see mother nature take its course. But I really hope they give you some answers! I know how frustrating it is girl! Try and relax and remember everything happens for a reason! I too am worrying about the weather...my Mom said to expect a blizzard Tuesday into Wednesday! Which means we'll have nasty snow and than ice pretty much into the weekend. I'm like great...I'll go into labor then! But just remember, a lot of things are out of our control and we can't do anything about it...so try and take it easy!! And were here for you if you need to talk or vent :)Keep us posted!

well ihope it goes well  we are ecpecting the  similar bad weather on tues here in Ma  so i am thinking great i never going to make to the doctor then lol. HOpefully  ur MIL has a safe drive .Again relaz as much as u  can and try to reduce stress that way  u can stay healthy    i dont think they would want to play with an issue like the preeclampisia(sp)   that is what u  have correct sorrryv ery tired and  not feeeling  well myself i have a horrbile  cold at the moment. That  condition can be  serious that is what they are  watching me for every time i go  in i am  get bp done constantly while i wait and  alwasy taking urine and  blood  smpales for testing. I have gotten on the a  frist name  person with the lady in the  lab there it is kind of cool seeing as when i work i do the same thing lol . again let us on here know  how u make out  tomorrow when you call  or  when u go in to see them  again wishing u the  bestJesselynn

Well, its not just the fiances and DH, I was diagnozed with preeclampsia and it is getting worse. My level is close to 400 and when my MIL heard that...she packed her bags and is heading here tomorrow from VA because she has no doubt they will induce this week with a number like that. SHe works on the delivery floor (RN) of the VA hospital and spoke with the MD's that she works with and they all said to her that they would 100% induce with a number like that. So, I am hoping that that is the news that I get tomorrow morning. Hopefulyl at least...because my MIL is leaving first thing in the morning and the office doesnt open until 830 am..so it would really stink for her to be on her way to find out that they arent going to do anything and to have to turn back around. We will see......
I will definetely update tomorrow after I find out everything that is going on and let you laides know the status of what the doc says. I can only hope for the best at this point!

I am sorry your going through this, I cannot even imangine being in your shoes. Is it safe for you to try the slef inducing methods? Like spicy food, sex, and certain tea's?Unfortunatly I am starting to think that OBGYN's dont care about women comfort. Good luck.

Ohh I see...sorry I'm not too familiar with Preclampsia. But if thats the case than I don't see why they wouldn't induce you ? It sounds pretty serious, like you or the baby could be at harm if they make you wait until labor starts on its own. I hope you get some answers this morning...keep us posted girl!

question: So, I am going to call the on call person today and discuss induction! I know they have been back and forth on it...but now its a matter of comfort for me and hubby and I would like to know what you ladies think!!!Being that I have been out of work since December 30th, my maternity leave started then. I was banking on my tax return to help me pay my bills throughout the rest of my maternity leave once she arrives. However, we did out taxes last night and, we are not getting NEARLY what we thought we were getting back. I immediately started crying. I pretty much cried all day yesterday......I am stressed to the max. We cant afford to miss a mortgage or car payment, or fall behind on anything. Do you think that they will take any of this into consideration???DOes the patient have any choice whatsoever in the matter??? I just cant do this...I need this baby out!I am officially 38 weeks, I dont see the harm...but dont know what they are going to say!
title: What do you think my chances are???
